name: CommonFrameworksForIOS
summary: CommonFrameworksForIOS is custom animated floating TextField written in Swift5 & compatable in version 12.0 and greater.
description: 'CommonFrameworksForIOS is an awesome pod and a great alternate of default TextField powered by EncoreSky Technologiew Pvt. Ltd., Indore (M.P.), aimed to make your life easier around TextFields.'
